name: 1dSEM
author: Gang Chen, Daniel R. Glen, Jason L. Stein, Andreas S. Meyer-Lindenberg, Ziad S. Saad, Robert W. Cox
description: Computes path coefficients for connection matrix in Structural Equation Modeling (SEM).

inputs.description: Connection matrix 1D file with initial representation
inputs.name: Theta File

inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations for convergence (Default=10000). Values can range from 1 to any positive integer less than 10000.
inputs.name: Maximum Iterations

inputs.description: Number of random trials before optimization (Default = 100).
inputs.name: Random Trials

inputs.description: Lower and upper limits for connection coefficients (Default = -1.0 to 1.0)
inputs.name: Limits

inputs.description: No modeling at all, just calculate the cost function for the coefficients as given in the theta file.
inputs.name: Calculate Cost Flag

inputs.description: Search for best model by growing a model for one additional coefficient from the previous model for n-1 coefficients.
inputs.name: Tree Growth Flag

inputs.description: Search for best model by growing a model for one additional coefficient from the previous model for n-1 coefficients.
inputs.name: Model Search Flag

inputs.description: Maximum number of paths to include (Default = 1000).
inputs.name: Maximum Paths

inputs.description: Stop searching for paths when cost function is below this value (Default = 0.1).
inputs.name: Stop Cost

inputs.description: Search over all possible models by comparing models at incrementally increasing number of path coefficients.
inputs.name: Forest Growth Flag

inputs.description: Search over all possible models by comparing models at incrementally increasing number of path coefficients.
inputs.name: Grow All Flag

inputs.description: Expands the search optimization to look at multiple paths to avoid local minimum. This method is the default technique for tree growth and standard coefficient searches.
inputs.name: Leafpicker Flag

output-files.description: Output printed to the terminal. This file may be redirected.
output-files.name: Output File
